General.Name: Amigo Technology Inc.
General.Description: Amigo Technology Inc., an OEM/ODM company, provides various support services related to the design, manufacture, and after-sales service for networking and communication products. The company offers Wi-Fi access points, such as enterprise indoor and ruggedized access points; and mesh routers. Amigo Technology Inc. was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Tainan City, Taiwan.
